name: Sexy Blackjack
description:
Enjoy a sexy game of Blackjack with the dealer of your choice.

Play Blackjack

Blackjack is the most widely played casino banking game in the world, with a goal to hit a 21 or as close to 21 as possible without going over. They say the house always wins. Can you defy the odds?

Enjoy the company of your dealer

Each girl has a unique set of poses and responses to what happens at the table. Choose between Red, Indigo and Rose. Every game will be a different experience. Which one will be your favorite?

Unlock Costumes and new dealers

There are six costumes for each dealer, for a total of 18 different combinations. Initially, costumes will change at set intervals of winnings. If you win a total of 10,000 cash against a dealer, you will unlock all of her costume options* and the ability to challenge the next girl.

Free Play Mode

Once you’ve fully defeated a dealer and unlocked all of her costume options, you’re free to start a game in Free Play, where you get to decide how much cash you bring to the table and what outfit she’s wearing.


*The final stage after beating a dealer features nudity. However, you can always select the SFW option in the settings if you prefer.
